"The Last Wave": A sci-fi film set in a future where the ocean has dried up, leaving only a vast, barren wasteland. A small group of survivors, led by a determined young woman, must band together to find a way to restore the ocean and save their planet from extinction. Along the way, they encounter strange creatures and unexpected allies, forcing them to confront the true cost of their survival.

"The Fossil Coast": A post-apocalyptic novel set in a world where the ocean has dried up, revealing ancient fossils and hidden treasures. The story follows a group of treasure hunters, each with their own motives, as they race to uncover the secrets of the lost ocean. But as they delve deeper into the fossilized sea floor, they begin to uncover dark secrets and ancient mysteries that threaten to destroy their fragile alliances.

"The Dried Sea Chronicles": A graphic novel series that follows the adventures of a young boy named Kai as he explores the vast, barren wasteland left behind by the dried-up ocean. Kai discovers strange creatures and hidden ruins, leading him to uncover the truth about the ocean's disappearance and the ancient civilizations that once flourished there. Along the way, he must confront the harsh realities of survival in a world without water.

"The Ocean's Legacy": A video game set in a world where the ocean has dried up, leaving behind a vast, treacherous landscape. Players take on the role of a young explorer, tasked with uncovering the secrets of the lost ocean and restoring it to its former glory. Along the way, they must navigate dangerous creatures, rival treasure hunters, and ancient ruins, all while uncovering the truth about the ocean's disappearance.

"The Aquatic History": A historical drama series that explores the lives of the people who lived in the coastal cities before the ocean dried up. Each episode delves into a different aspect of coastal life, from fishing and trade to art and culture.
